漢羅台文: 嘛請越南朋友了解「臺灣人毋是華人，閣較毋是中國人」！
台羅: Mā tshiánn Ua̍t-lâm pîng-iú liáu-kái “Tâi-uân-lâng m̄ sī Huâ-jîn, koh-khah m̄ sī Tiong-kok-lâng”!
台羅數字調: ma7 tshiann2 uat8-lam5 ping5-iu2 liau2-kai2“tai5-uan5-lang5 m7 si7 hua5-jin5,koh4-khah4 m7 si7 tiong1-kok4-lang5”!
白話字: Mā chhiáⁿ Oa̍t-lâm pêng-iú liáu-kái“Tâi-oân-lâng m̄ sī Hôa-jîn,koh-khah m̄ sī Tiong-kok-lâng”!
